text: Vot, vy stoyali na blizhayshey vozvyshennosti, a oni na dal'ney vozvyshennosti, karavan zhe - nizhe ot vas; - yesli by vy mezhdu soboyu stali naznachat' sebe mesto i vremya, to vy ne sladilis' by mezhdu soboy v naznachenii mesta i vremeni, - no to bylo dlya togo, chto by Bogu sovershit' sobytiye, kakomu dolzhno bylo sdelat'sya; chtoby pogib tot, komu nepremenno dolzhno pogibnut', i byl by zhiv tot, komu nepremenno dolzhno zhit'. Istinno Bog slyshashchiy, znayushchiy
